mapper.sql: from top_list where name like '%${name}%' and status != 1
mapper.select: select a.id, a.title from top_list_artifact t inner join artifact a on t.artifactId = a.id and a.status != 1 where t.topId = #{id} order by t.artifactOrder
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO top_list(name,type,topOrder, startTime, tags) VALUE (#{name}, #{type}, #{topOrder},#{startTime}, #{tags})
mapper.update: update top_list set status = 1 where id in (${ids})
update top_list set listImageFileName = #{dto.listImageFileName} where id = #{dto.id}
